name: Momodora: Reverie Under The Moonlight
description: Momodora: Reverie Under The Moonlight is the fourth installment in the beloved Momodora series of 2D platformers. Unleash ravaging combos against a variety of formidable monsters and deftly dodge your way through a cursed land to seek audience with the Queen and dispel the evil that threatens all life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or superior Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB (with Pixel Shader support) Storage: 200 MB available space
